snippet: A senior Chinese official will meet with Vietnam’s deputy prime minister in the first high-level discussions since tensions between the countries escalated in May.
abstract: Senior Chinese official, Yang Jiechi, will meet with Deputy Prime Min Pham Binh Minh of Vietnam in first high-level discussions between the two countries since early May, when sea vessels from two sides rammed each other in disputed waters near Chinese deep-sea oil rig installation.
lead_paragraph: A senior Chinese official will meet with Vietnam’s deputy prime minister in the first high-level discussions since tensions between the countries escalated in May.

headline.main: China Sends Top Diplomat to Begin Talks With Vietnam
headline.print_headline: China Sends Top Diplomat to Begin Talks With Vietnam
